You are a horrible person. I'm serious, that's what it says: "A horrible person." We weren't even testing for that. Don't let that horrible-person thing discourage you. It's just a data point. If it makes you feel any better, science has now validated your birth mother's decision to abandon you on a doorstep.

No matter how many times you play Portal 2 you never get bored with it. It's brilliant and the co-op is pure gold.
Great puzzels

Valve's original Portal game took the gaming scene by storm. The idea was super simple, but they made a masterpiece out of it. The second game in the series is a definite improvement. It builds on what the user already knows, and adds new mechanics to spice up the gameplay. Portal 2 is a must-play.

While it's still really good and mechanically superior to its predecessor, the campaign puzzles are considerably easier to the first one which, depending on how you like 'em puzzles, might qualify as a plus or minus. It's definitely the latter in my case.

Nevertheless, it's a good puzzle game; nice enough campaign length, a separate co-op campaign, and a huge plethora of community-made levels. Available for chump change during sales. Highly recommended.

Portal 2 é um jogo incrível, primeiro por fazer uma mistura de puzzles com fps, algo que se falado antes de Portal, pareceria impossível, mas a Salve mostrou que é possível fazer um jogo maravilho com essa mistura. O humor do jogo , com certeza, é um dos maiores pontos altos do game, a Glados e Wheatley tem muito mais personalidades que muito humanos, isso faz o jogo ser ainda melhor.

Una obra maestra, en todos los campos. La historia es genial, y el carisma que tienen lo protagonistas lo hacen unico y sin dar lugar a comparación. Este que es un juego de puzles te cuenta un divertida y a desenfadada historia mientras tratas de resolver los problemas que te imponen.
Buen juego, buenos pusles, the cake is a lie

Portal 2 is by far one of my favourite games at the moment. Yes there are some bugs but it is lots of fun and has some very challenging puzzles. If you are reading this thinking about if you should get or not, the answer is yes.
